comments.body:
This allows to have an increase pattern also in the following case:
```scala
extension [T] \\ here it will increase the Intendation
  (using b: B)(s: String) 
```

will this be a valid syntax?

And I'm not sure that other regexes will handle the indentation after the second line, but as @tgodzik said, it doesn't handle multiple lines.
Och, I think this should not increase the indentation, that's msot likely not a valid syntax.
Actually, the syntax works, but it was not the intention :O

Scratch that! Funnily enough, we should indent after anything because:
```scala
extension [T] \\ here it will increase the Intendation
  (using b: B)(s: String) 
```

is valid while:
```scala
extension [T] \\ here it will increase the Intendation
(using b: B)(s: String) 
```
is not.

@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  private val keywordClause = raw"\b(then|else|do|catch|finally|yield|case)"
  private val openBraceClause = raw"""(^.*\{[^}"']*$$)"""
  private val extensionClause = raw"""extension\s*((\(|\[).*(\)|\]))+"""
  val increaseIndentPatternRegex: Regex =
    raw"""($noEndClause|$ifThenClause|$keywordClause|$extensionClause|=|=>|<-|=>>|:)\s*?$$|$openBraceClause""".r
